name: omg_ubuntu
author: Ohso Ltd.
description:
The official OMG! Ubuntu! Firefox add-on.

Stay up to date with the latest Ubuntu news and developments.

The OMG! Ubuntu! add-on adds a button that displays an orange bubble when new items appear on the site and displays a pop-up notification bubble – though this can be turned off in from the add-on's entry in the Add-ons Manager.

Click the OMG! logo to view scrollable, drop-down menu with the latest posts from OMG! Ubuntu!.

Unread items have a red 'bookmark' logo to the left. To mark all posts as a read click the 'Mark All As Read' text at the bottom the add-on window.

To read an item just click its title to go straight to the post on OMG! Ubuntu!.

To share an item on Twitter or Facebook just click one of the social icons to the right of the post.

preferences.name: notificationsEnabled
preferences.title: Enable Notifications
preferences.description:
Show or hide notifications that pop up when new articles arrive.
NOTE: This feature requires Growl or Hiss on OS X.
